TopicTitle: When changing staging options, objects behind the stages are selected and moved simultaneously

Articles.Content: When clicking and dragging staging items around in the VAB, parts of the craft being designed are also selected and dragged which is undesirable. No-one could ever find this useful. Please prevent that. Also, please eliminate the overlap of the staging options and the exit VAB button. Thanks.
Would be more useful as a bug report/feedback, but I agree. The staging list should have at least a bit of input lock.
